page.title: 20A TYPICAL WEEKDAY
page.content: The average number of people that have pets is nine in each class.There are about 30 children in each class. Not many people walk their dogs in the morning.Most feed them when they get up which is roughly at 7:00am. Most parents start work at 9:00am and finish between 5-6 in the evening. Everybody in our class washes in the morning but some wash again at night. Most people wash their hair twice a week.In our class,23clean their teeth at night,10,twice a day,7 just in the morning,and3,not at all. The first person to get up in the morning is usually Dad. The first person to go to bed is usually the youngest child. In the evening,most families watch television,some read.Many fathers do odd jobs while mums do housework.Many children help in the house or play.
